"Gunslashes Are Used Like This!":
"Gunslashes aren't for rangers only,
anyone can use them. You can either use
them as a pistol, or slash your enemies.
Either way, you get to choose how to
harass your enemies.

As for how to use it, Lisa will teach you,
so be sure to practice and come back!
※Gunslashes only.
Recommend [Subdue Fangulf]"
